metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2918 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the Image loading functionality of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite v2.78c. A specially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to open the file or use it as a library in order to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: blender: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
